sentences.en: Note how Telemachus in the Odyssey silences his mother.
sentences.cn: 只要读一下《奥德赛》,就可以看到特里曼珠是怎样打断他母亲的话并要求她缄默.

sentences.en: Telemachus, in Homer’s story of the Odyssey, tipped his vehicle vertically against a wall, while others removed their wheels in the evening (Gordon, 1978) to prevent warping.
sentences.cn: 荷马史诗里的忒勒马科斯在晚上把他的车竖直靠墙，而其他的车则被卸去了轮毂以防止变形（戈登，1978）。

sentences.en: The subject is Telemachus being knighted by Minerva in some gardens.
sentences.cn: 画的是密涅瓦封忒勒玛科斯为骑士.

trans.tran_cn: <希神>忒勒马科斯(Odysseus 和Penelope之子)
忒勒玛科斯（Odysseus 和 Penelope 之子）
trans.tran_en: the son of Odysseus and Penelope, who helped his father slay his mother's suitors
